abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Caribbean
            Catastrophe Risk Insurance Facility (CCRIF) Project is to
            help provide a better mechanism for dealing with
            catastrophic risks initially in the Caribbean region by
            supporting an (sic) establishment and operations of the
            Caribbean Catastrophe Risk Insurance Facility. The purpose
            of this level two restructuring is to increase the amount of
            the trust fund CCRIF grant agreement from US$70,000,000 to
            US$70,997,902.39  million by transferring to it
            US$997,902.39 from the Multi-donor Trust Fund (MDTF), as
            requested by the grantee. The restructuring is consistent
            with the purposes of the MDTF, the terms of the
            administration agreements between the World Bank and the
            donors, and the purposes for which CCRIF was established.
